document_notes.text:
This update for libcroco fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12825: Fixed recursion issue in block and any productions (bsc#1171685).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: libcroco through 0.6.13 has excessive recursion in cr_parser_parse_any_core in cr-parser.c, leading to stack consumption.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
